p: The concentration of each compound was calculated based on their chromatographic area and the analytical curve of each compound. The highest amount of linalool (12.2 mg mL −1) and estragole (51.6 mg mL −1) was obtained in the samples extracted with an ultrasound time of 31 min, 60 min of hydrodistillation and drying temperature of leaves of 30 °C ( Table 3). These conditions of extraction of the compounds were applied in the method validation process.
